data.name: NE RPC
data.description: NE RPC is a community-organised, free-to-attend virtual conference, showcasing speakers from the North East of England. We’ll be hosting a day of 30-minute talks, covering a wide variety of tech subjects. Whether bleeding-edge or tried-and-tested, we’re listening!

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: API Specifications Conference 2020
relatedRecords.description: A place for API practitioners to come together and discuss the evolution of API technology including cutting edge keynotes and sessions that chart the future of APIs, in-depth specification and standards discussions and an extensive tutorial track.

relatedRecords.name: M365 Philly (AKA SPS Philly)
relatedRecords.description: Administrators, end-users, architects, developers, and other professionals that work with Microsoft Collaboration or Cloud Technologies will meet to share the latest information for working with SharePoint, Microsoft365, the Power Platform and related offerings from Microsoft.
